mapper.sql: phone, name, sex, birthday, address, password
mapper.insert:
insert into login
phone,
name,
sex,
birthday,
address,
password,
#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update login
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update login set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from login where 1 = 1
and login.phone like '%${phone}%'
and login.name like '%${name}%'
and login.sex = #{sex}
and login.address like '%${address}%'
